fr.eikasus.objectsmyfriends.model.bll.implementations

Class ImageManagerImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.eikasus.objectsmyfriends.model.bll.implementations.GenericManagerImpl
      • fr.eikasus.objectsmyfriends.model.bll.implementations.ImageManagerImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ImageManager

    @ApplicationScoped
 @ImageManagerDB
public class ImageManagerImpl
extends GenericManagerImpl
implements ImageManager
    Image manager class.

    This class is used to manage images according to the business logic. It should be used by the controllers to handle images like adding, deleting and so. The access of one of data access object method by the controllers is strictly forbidden. There is no method to retrieve images from the database because they are contained in the item itself. Retrieving an item allow then access to its images.

    See Also:
    add(Item, String), delete(Image)

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public Image add(Item item,
                 java.lang.String path)
          throws ModelException
        Create an item image.

        This method create an image into the database and attach it to the item supplied in parameter. This method doesn't care about how the image file is retrieved and how it is saved in the system storage.

        Specified by:
        add in interface ImageManager
        Parameters:
        item - Item that the new image belongs to.
        path - Path to the image file.
        Returns:
        The newly created image.
        Throws:
        ModelException - In case of problem.

      • delete

        public void delete(@NotNull
                   @NotNull Image image)
            throws ModelException
        Delete an image.

        This method delete an image from the database and remove it from the item.

        Specified by:
        delete in interface ImageManager
        Parameters:
        image - Image to delete from the database.
        Throws:
        ModelException - In case of problem.
